values: AND HE LOVES ME!!!!! OMG not only have i gotten down to 158lbs last night i bought a size 12 and I"M WEARING THEM RIGHT NOW!!! WOOOHOOOO I can not believe it a size 12 never in my wildest dreams did i think i would be in them. I just want to scream and jump around this is so awesome. I guess I'm gonna have to change around my goals since I'm in these way sooner then i thought. heheh off to workout size 10 here i come

Do you have now or have you ever had any of the following?

*A family history of diabetes, overweight problems, abnormal cholesterol or triglycerides, heart disease, or stroke

*Frequent cravings for sweet or salty, crunchy snack food

*The need to eat often or eat excessive amounts of food

*A difficult time losing weight even if you exercise or cut back on your food intake

*A problem with weight gain even when eating small amounts of food

*Weight gain mostly around your waist

*Skin tags (small, painless, flappy skin growths) on your neck, chest, breasts, groin area, or underarms

*A history of irregular menstrual periods, especially skipping months

*A history of polycystic ovarian disease

*High triglyceride levels

*Low HDL cholesterol (the "good" type of cholesterol) levels, that is, lower than 35 mg/dl

*High LDL cholesterol (the "bad" type of cholesterol) levels, that is higher than 130 mg/dl

*High or borderline high blood pressure--even during pregnancy

*The feeling that you are addicted to carbohydrates

*The feeling that you have no willpower when it comes to dieting

*Jitteriness, difficulty thinking, headaches, or nausea that goes away when you eat

*Hypoglycemia

*Afternoon fatigue

*Type II diabetes, borderline diabetes, or abnormal glucose tolerance tests--even just during pregnancy

*High uric acid or gout

*History of having a blood clot in your legs, lungs, or brain

*A doctor telling you that you need to eat less in order to lose weight, yet those close to you are amazed at how little you eat

*The belief that you are at least thirty pounds overweight

*A Body Mass Index (BMI) of 30 or higher

*Native-American, Asian, African-American, or Hispanic ancest

One of my C2L buddies posted this the other day. I was completely surprised to see that several of them pertain to me. The next time I'm in to see the doc I'm going to talk to her and I'm going to pick up the book at the library this week. Andrea you may want to take a look at it to

I was just talking to Mandie and I realized how much less I workout then I did when I first joined WW. I used to get up in the morning do 30 mins on my tredmill and 30 mins on my stationary bike get ready for the day do my 15 min 6 sec abs DVD during the morning nap and then a 3mile WATP DVD which was another 45 mins. 

Now I'm lucky to get 30 mins. This has to change if I plan to get to my goal of 130lbs. SO here goes

My promise to Mandie and all my friends and family: I promise you I will do no less then 1 hr of a workout each day giving myself a rest day on Saturday or sunday.

We bought Jerimie a bike tonight so we could ride as a family we have a little stroller cart thingy for Vinnie and Emma. Emma can't get the peddles figured out yet. Margaret did pretty good for her first big ride we went about 5 blocks and back she biffed in once not to bad though nothing broken no blood so we're good. I think we'll start riding every night after dinner before swim lessons. I found my roller blades yesterday I'm just not sure if I want to try them right now. I have to work up the nerve or be drunk when I use them. 

I'm hoping my legs aren't to sore in the morning it's the first morning I'll get to workout. This 5:30 family is really screwing up my workout time. I'm just having to work it in when I can.

wow i never thought it was gonan happen. I'm offically 40lbs thinner then I was a year ago. It's taken a while but I'm working on it. I have about 38 more to go to get to my goal. all the weight charts say I should way between 100-120 so we'll see how I feel and look at 130.

I finally finally am out of the 180's as of 2 weeks ago only becasue I was deathly ill did I get down to 178. Thank good. I was afraid with my period coming I'd go back up but I didn't praise god.

i went over to McDonalds to get one of their adult happy meals only for the workout DVD but they were all out. damn it. I'll just be jealous of poohbearhunney that she has them. Speaking of poohbearhunney she gave me a link for a cool hip hop workout http://www.nike.com/nikewomen/us/index.jhtml I can't wait to get it and try it out. 

I'm gonna try to get the kids off to the park after nap so I can get in another workout. I'm doing really well getting up at 5:30 to workout with Denise Austin at 6. I can see the changes in my body and I'm loving it. I can do this how ever long it takes me.

woohoo I'm finally at 168.0 it took being sick over the weekend but I'll take it I'm just .2 away from having lost 40lbs so far. It's crazy to think I've lost that much and were in the world was it on me. 

My 16's are to big so I'm checking into some 14's there is a little used store a few miles form here I'm gonan check and see if they have that size. I'm setting a goal for the IA State Fair this year. I want to be in size 12's if possible. NO wait it is possible and I'm gonna work as hard as I can to do it. 

Next stop 150's

For DH's bday I got Yankees ticket. (excuse me while I throw up LOL) The game is Sept 5th I wouls like to lose 20lbs by then that gives me all summer to get in alot of exercise outside. 

In order to reach this goal I will do walks both with the kids and by myself
I'm going to ride my bike as well.
I'll have the kids outside alot so I'm going to run around with them in the yard.
I already workout in the morning but my plan is to do M,W,F the 1 hour show and Tues and Thur the 30 mins show.
When I'm sitting or standing I'll be moving all the time. doing lunges, side to side steps, if I'm near my weights I'll grab one to help with toning I'm going to do everything I can to get this challenge done. 

Everyone is welcome to challenge me I'm up for it and I need all the encouragment I can get and all the pushing you want to give me.
__________________

I finally finally got out of my slump a few weeks ago I said bye bye to 177 HELLOO 173 I'll be in the 160's in no time. I realized I had to go back to strict WW's. I have to count my points and journal it's the ONLY thing that works for me. I have now proven to myself that I can't just keep track in my head or wait til the end of the day I have to do it the minute I'm doing it. 

I'll be so glad this summer when we can get outside. I think I might try jogging in the mornings. I won't have to get the girls up so I'll be able to go out around 6:30 and be home by 7:30 or I can go back to my hour workout on my bike and treadmill in the morning. It'll also help that I'm signing the girls up for summer activites. Swim lessons, and mini camps will keep us busy. Margaret starts soccor in a few weeks I'm waiting to hear from the coach. I want to try to lose a bug amount of weight this summer and be outside as much as possible with the kids.

I'm really bad about getting in my milk products. I dug out my exercise ball and have been using it this week. I really want a video to go with it.

I finally was able to get to the grocery store I'm all stocked up on my fruits and veggies again and healthy treats for me. I just have to bug Andrea for a few of her recipes she's been making.

YUK I still have the taste from the sour cream tasting yogurt..

There is also a workout that goes along with it but I'll save that for another day. This wa sa great workout but I'm gonna be hurtin in the morning. 


Oh what sucks is they have a lady doing an easy verson and they tell you to watch her if your a beginner but you can't see her half the time. What the Hell..

I've been wanting to make chili for a few weeks now and last night I finally made a list of stuff I needed I also knew mom and Jerimie wouldn't go for a veggie chili so I got stuff for my chili and the regular chili I usually make. I picked the bean and lentail chili is was so good. I'm gonna have to make a note for next time to cut back on the chili powder. Yikes it was hot. 

I'm gonna keep looking up recipes and trying them out I'm not cutting out meat but I can cut back. 



Exercise for today 45 mins Light yoga,legs,thigh training, high impact arobeics, upper body weights. Denise Austin

The fast food was a good thing though. Atleast I got sick from eating it then I now that my body is getting it out of my system and I won't be tempted to get it when I'm out and busy I'll just have to come home and fix something good for me.

Maybe I can talk Jerimie into helping I was going to wait for my trip to Minnesota to have Andrea but I just can't.

Difficulty: Easy 
Prep Time: 15 minutes 
Cook Time: 2 hours 
Yield: 6 to 8 servings 

This is the most delicious and vibrant take on chicken soup, the get well classic, that I could come up with. Lots of hearty pieces of chicken meat, a sweet broth with lots of bright veggies. I add a touch of heat with hot sauce at the end to get a little sweat going to get all those evil sick bugs out. Make it ahead of time and just heat it up at my friend's house.


4 small onions, quartered 
6 cloves garlic, peeled 
1 pound carrots, peeled and cut into -2inch chunks 
2 pounds chicken thighs, skin removed 
Handful thyme sprigs 
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper 
1 1/2 pounds red bliss potatoes, washed and quartered 
2 handfuls green beans, trimmed 
Hot pepper sauce, to taste

In a large pot, combine onions, garlic, carrots, chicken and thyme. Season with salt and pepper. Add cold water to cover. Bring to boil then reduce heat to a simmer. Skim and discard any scum that may come to the top. 
Simmer until the meat of the chicken falls off the bone with almost no pressure from a fork, about 1 to 1 1/2 hours. Remove the chicken pieces to a plate. Use 2 forks to separate the meat from the bone. Add the meat back to pot. 

Add the potatoes, cook until fork tender, about 20 minutes. Add green beans, cook until crisp-tender, about 3 to 4 minutes. Remove from heat, add hot sauce, salt and pepper to taste.

I feel so good this week I'm back on the right track and saw a 2.5 lose this week. Having a workout buddy is just great. Ann and I keep each other going wheather we want to do it or not. So as of yesterday I am down 26 lbs for good. I really need to take pictures so I can look back on the transformation I've gone through. I also need to do my measurements. I might have Andrea do them when I go up in Nov since it's best to have someone else do them so you can stand straight. I've been making good food choses. I've been making several huge pots of low point soups so I can freeze then and get them out when I want. I really have to work on planning for the week and sticking to it. I'm doing that this week. 

This is my workout plan for the next month in order to be fit for Team 4Mom. 
Get up with my 1st alarm at 5:30 hop on my tradmill or bike for an hour or half hour each. then after Emma leaves do some floor workouts and weight training. I want to work on my abs to daily. I have the option of doing a workout in the morning that on tv it's with Denise Austin she has 2 half hour shows daily. SO I might go back and forth. So I have that planned I just have to follow through with it and I'm going to the best I can.

I've been working my butt off the last two weeks. Thanks to Ann's support. I was sure I wouldn't lose this week becasue I'm expecting my period. But I'm down to 183.5 I haven't seen that number since I was pregant with Margaret. Now Today I jumped on the scale just for the hell of it. I was 182. OH MY GOD!!! I might acutally get to the weight I have on my drivers license soon.


I didn't get a workout done yesterday. My buddy Ann volunteered to help out at work thur and fri and next week to. But I did get the rest of the windows closed and plastic on and I did get the touch ups done in the kitchen. I just have to get the border put up and then I think I'm done in the kitchen. Then it's on to the entry way and basement. I should do some yard work that would count as a workout. I was gonna hop on my gazelle and do the shuffle workout but I'm just so tired. I'll figure something out to do..

onward and down the scale I go.

I was up at 6:15 jumped in the shower and dressed for the day. I got margaret up and movin for school while she was getting dressed and eating I decided to get in my workout. I popped in Richard adn went to town. After that I ate my yummy oatmeal. I've decided I really don't like the vanilla soy milk. I'm gonna stick to the flavored kind I found out this weekend the kind I've been drinking is only 1 pt. Here I was using the one on my WW site and it was 3 pts. After Margaret left I decided to move out the fridge I have to clean back there sometime so we can paint. I was attacked by so many dust bunnies. GEEEEZZZZZZ I got that done and scrubbed the floor. I got some nails hammered in where I want stuff to go once we're done painting. it's been one busy day. This is the first tiem I've really been able to sit down. I hope I'm like this everyday I'll be skinny in no time and my house will be spottless.  Thanks to Ann I have a new item for my Harry Potter collection. Today was just a good day for that to. I got 2 of the books I got on ebay and Ann's little treat for me. Today is just great. I do my WI tomorrow. I have my fingers crossed I weighed myself yeterday and I was 184 but when I did it this morning not so good. I might have been standing wrong.  On the move.

Today Ann and I did a workout together. Yes Yes it was long distance. She did her 30 mins and I did mine and then we checked in with each other. .I did 10 mins of weights and floor exercise also for a grand total of 3 pts.. I ate my points and didn't go over or stay under I did the right number and got just about all my fruits and veggies. I only got 1 glass of milk I think I'm gonna start making my oatmeal with milk instead of water. I really like the soy milk I got vanilla and cappocino flavor this time. I'm out of my oatmeal do I'm gonna pick some up in the morning. 

I sent Ann my recipes so she could get some new ideas. I'm completely in love with Andrea's stuffed squash recipe. I bought several squash at the farmer's market last weekend. I made 3 of them and froze 2 of them. I added a few things to it this time and it made it even more yummier then it already was. 

Well it's off to work for me. I have a busy mornign so I'm gonna try to get up early to do a workout since I might not be home to do one with Ann..

Aunt Flo is on her way I feel so bloated. I didn't eat or drink real well the past 2 weeks because of stress and now I'm feeling it. I've been drinking my water like crazy the past 2 days just to get some relief. My rings are so tight at night. This week I'm back to counting my points and Wed I'm back to doing a workout during the day after Emma leaves for school. I figure if I put Vinnie down for his morning nap shortly after Emma leaves and McKayla plays in the swing I'll be able to do more then my gazelle. Evan once Zoey comes shes just a tiny baby I'll still be able to do a workout in the morning. Andrea said that she would go walking with me to when we're low on kids. So I'm slowly getting back into my heathy habits and thats good.

I love flavored water. My mom brought home this new water a few days ago and I wasn't to sure about trying it. I'm one that once I find something I like it's hard for me to change or to try anything else. I finally tried the lemon flavor not to bad I tried the strawberry way to strong. I wen tfor the peach today and liked it. So I would suggest everyone give it a try Aqua Cal. Remember water is best.

ok I'm back to the begining. After a long week of worrying about my #2 mom. I am back on track. Today I am working on getting my vitamin and water in. Monday I'll start tracking my points again. Wed I'll start my workouts again. I figure if I start it all at different times I'll do better at getting it all in and staying on track. 

I need to get lots of veggies and fruits in and I really need to get in my calcuim. milk gives me a stomach ache I had thought about trying soy milk but I just can't bring myself to buy it. I wish they sold in in smaller bottles. 

With gas prices going up I'm going to walk Margaret to school I'd walk her home but I have way to many kids in the afternoon plus traffic is crazy after school. I'm at it again and I know my friends will be great support when I'm falling apart...

After talking to Steph last night about applying for amazing race I knew I had to get my butt in gear. So I set all my alarms last night and Vinnie just happened to get up at 5:45 which 15 minutes before my 1st alarm. so I set the VCR to tape Denise Austin which is who I used to workout with way back in high school. So after Vinnie went back to sleep around 6:10 I went down got my workout clothes on and hopped on my stationary bike. I always read my book while on my bike just to keep me occupied so I don't get bored and stop. After about the 2nd chapter I had read I looked adn it had been 30 mins already I was really shocked I rode for about 20 more minutes which is nothing compared to my wonder friend Andrea who goes for ever on her real bike. WHen I was done I had gone 7 miles. So after I got showered and dressed I made up my mind I needed to write down my food intake thats what helps me the best instead of just keeping notes in my head. I just have to do it everyday. I talked to 1hipmom for a while and did the whole breakfast lunch nap thing with the kids. After the cravens left I decided to do one of the 2 workouts I taped this morning. I feel pretty good now. 


Last night I thought about how I was going to have the energy to get up in teh morning so early and I need to be doing it all the time with Margaret going to school all day so I thought why not take my Vitamin b and B12 before bed it must have worked because I was ready to go when Vinnie was up at 5:45. I'm going to try this every night to see how it goes. I want so badly to go for a walk but I don't want to take the kids with they like to look at everything so it would take forever just to cross the street. I'm hoping Jerimie gets home from fishing before it gets to dark and maybe I can hit the track up at the school. i'm dying to try out my new shoes I got his past weekend. Jerimei bought me a pair of the new NIKE spring shoes that are out. The mall was having big sales with the no tax weekend. 

Well this is the end of a good day for me. I'm hoping that I can journal every night so I can see how I'm doing weeks from now.

I know how I always say I'm starting over but this time I have. I've been doing really well with my exercise everyday for the last 2 weeks. I'm slowly getting back into counting my points. So far I've gotten back down to my 10% and lost 2 more lbs. I figured it up since October when I started dieting I've lost 41lbs. Why would I give up now when I'm doing so well. I can tell I've lost weight I can fit back into my 16's and I'm working towards fitting into my 14's that are cin the bottom on my dresser by the end of summer. I want to succeed this time I'm not going to give up. I know I can do this. I just have to tell myself each day that I'm doing a great job and I'm seeing results. It may take a while but thats ok and I might have a few set backs along the way but I'm going to get back on my feet everytime.

I looked at a picture that Margaret took to school last year. The theme was family and I looked huge yes I was pregnant but I was sitting down and I just looked FAT! I have to get together with Andrea one of these weekends and have her take pictures of me. I'm going to do this every few months so that I can see how far I've come along and I'm not going back to what I looked like in that family picture Margaret took to school. EVER!!!!!!!!

I've been working my butt off and the challenge on C2L is helping. I'm going to look great when we leave for Chicago.

This month Mandy and I figured out a new challenge for all teh girls. We are starting out at Heather's house in Cali and marching all the way to SC.You get 10 miles for every minute you exercise- so if you exercise 30 minutes it counts as 300 miles.  Today I did 7 miles on my bike it took 60 mins plus a little detour to be on the radio. So I went 600 miles today. We are "stopping" by people houses on the way my house is next then Lynette lives in Cedars Falls and then off to Cary who lives in Illinois and so on. It's just a little fun thing for us to do. I love the challenges we come up with it keeps us all motivated. I want to post the pictue Mandy made but I can't figure out how. I'll have to see if Andrea can figure it out.

Well I'm offically to small for my size 20's I'm comfortable in my size 18 's again. Thank god, and I tried on a size 16  and they fit a little snug but they fit so I'm heading in the right direction. I want to hit my first 10% by my birthday I only have to lose 9 lbs and I'm sure I can do that in 17 days or atleast come close to it. I need to get back into writing everything down the is my one downfall. I usually keep track in my head how many points I use but writing it down really helps me. I just need to find a way to make it fun.

I had a good WI after last weeks gain. I lost 1.4 lbs. that puts me at an 11.2 total in 8 weeks. This next week I'm going to work even hard to lose 2 lbs. That my goal. I'm going to wear my pedimeter everyday which will also be useful with the  Monthly Challenge Mandy and I came up with The March to Mandy's. We're getting the distance it takes to get from everyone to her house then we'll get teh rules set up.

BUT I'm back on track all this week I did my bike did 7 miles everyday. Yesterday I did my 6 sec abs workout but didn't get in my ride. If my scale is any indication of my WI tomorrow I should be down 3 or 4 lbs. Very exciting. I just have to keep telling myself to keep going. I almost look forward to getting up an hour early to ride. I'm using my trip in May as a motivation to stay on track. I want to get a nice cute swimsuit and some new clothes with my taxes so I have to work really hard.  Jerimie has been talking about getting that Dance Revolution game one of my C2L friends loves it and says she gets a great workout. Maybe if we get it he'll stop this crap about me getting skinny and leaving him. He doesn't understand I'm doing this to make myself feeling better and healthier. I always forget to clean them and then I forget about them and they get gross so I washed them and cut them up for snacks. So far I'm working on my water intake and I'm doing it pretty darn good. Oh I bought  some WW frozen meals to try to. I picked some low point ones and wouldn't you know it I got my sweet and sour chix. I'm so excited. 

Naptime.

Today I did really good with my points I still have 9 to spare so I might have a treat before bed.

1 drink more water
2 get my exercise, at least 3 times a week
3 start eating right I'm not eating for two anymore.
4 start journaling again.
That is my start. I want to get down to what I was before I got pregnant which was 190 189. I was going back and forth between the two.
